```jsx
<Route exact path='/' component={Catalog}/>
<Route path='/about' component={About}/>
</Switch>
```

```jsx

<Route exact path='/' component={Catalog}/>
<Route path='/about' component={About}/>
<Route path='/footer' children={() => (<Footer />)}/>
</Switch>
```
